rows.label: tlk47600165_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Ahh, such an earthy smell...
It reminds me of that time a girl
arrived at the village.

rows.label: tlk47600165_03_msg0002
rows.name:
She was awfully haggard, all covered
in dirt and grime...but the child in her
arms was as healthy as could be.

rows.label: tlk47600165_03_msg0003
rows.name:
I still don't know where she came from.
I'd never seen clothes like that anywh...
Wait...perhaps I have...

rows.label: tlk47600165_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Hmm, I'm afraid I don't remember all
that clearly. It was the child that really
caught my attention...
